experience.title: Frontend | Backend Developer
descriptions: Developed and managed a dashboard for transportation firms to view passenger data using Angular, Tailwind CSS (frontend), and Express.js with MongoDB (backend).
Created interactive data visualizations like tables, charts, and custom views to offer insights on passenger flow, carriage usage, and entry/exit trends.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate sensor data seamlessly into the dashboard.

experience.title: Backend Developer
descriptions: Created a platform using Python with NiceGUI for tutors to manage project submissions and offer detailed feedback to students, integrating DynamoDB for database functionality.
Introduced an automated assignment algorithm for efficient distribution of project submissions to tutors, ensuring prompt corrections.
Designed and implemented a student dashboard with FastAPI backend and MongoDB data storage to monitor master program progress, including course and project status.

experience.title: Software Developer

Designed and implemented a web app for remote control of milling machines with Angular, NestJS, and PostgreSQL technologies.
Provided support and mentoring on a project involving React and Express technologies.
Developed a platform for electronic invoicing
